/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the glow of a bright sun, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. The street is teeming with life, with cars and buses moving along the road, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a human element to the urban landscape.

The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their facades made of glass and concrete, reflecting the sunlight and adding a touch of elegance to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a beautiful backdrop to the scene below.

The image is taken from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up at the towering buildings and the expansive sky. This perspective enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the busy street, taking in the sights and sounds of the city.
